website_summaries.verdict: Once you get the various massage settings down, it's hard to argue with the versatility and comfort this massager affords.
pros: A must-have for anyone with consistently sore feet and tired muscles
Helps to relieve fatigue and pain
cons: It's pricier than a lot of other choices, and there is a learning curve to using it

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Massage Top as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Advertising is deceiving. Does not “massage” top of feet. Based on the picture (attached) and description, it made it sound like there was kneading and actual massaging (not just pressure) on the top of the feet. However, the top does not knead as advertised. The picture specifically indicates that there is kneading on top and bottom, but there is not. The top only puts pressure on the top of the feet...that’s not a “massage” to me. The only reason why I bought this model was for the “top foot massage”.
customer_reviews.author: Jay En

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Three Months
customer_reviews.text: This product was worth every penny and worked great right up until it didn't. Sadly, that only took about three months of occasional use. Now all it does is beep at you when you press the power button. I'd think I could return or replace it, but the seller's return policy doesn't allow it. So now I'm left with a $180 piece of trash. Buyer beware: this thing is not built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had more options
customer_reviews.text: I thought this massager had more options than it does. The heat doesn't feel super hot, and the rolling mechanism doesn't change. The only thing that changes is the pressure on the feet (which make the rollers more or less intense). But the pressure goes on and off at regular, short intervals. There is no way to control that. If I want the pressure to stay on, too bad. A little disappointing, to be honest. It still feels good with the massage action, I just wish I could control the pressure and adjust the heat higher.
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: Great massager for the first 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Great massager for the first 6 months, but it quit working for no reason. I read about the same issue in the reviews, but I assumed mine would be 'different'. Not so much. When I called the company, no suggestions or solutions were given. Potential to be great, but fell short of good.
customer_reviews.author: kelly borgmann

customer_reviews.title: It mostly definitely does not feel like someone is massaging your feet
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it squeezes my toes too much, so I have to turn the pressure down but then I lose it on the rest of my feet. It mostly definitely does not feel like someone is massaging your feet! Lol but I can tell a great difference after using it after a 12 hour shift
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Heaven sent!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I had been looking for! All the other massagers just rub the bottom of your feet. I love that it includes squeezing the entire foot! I have fibromyalgia and my feet always hurt. This helps them feel better. I love that I can do this at home and don't have to go out and pay someone to rub my feet or bother my boyfriend for a foot rub! Worth every penny! :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: My mother has planters fasciitis and gets a serious pain in her feet and uses this daily to sooth it. It has different settings for how intense you want the message and it makes it easy to adjust for what you are wanting. It also has a timer on it to and it goes through a set session. There are really only 2 main issues i have with it is it does not really have a easy way of holding it to move it around and your feet tend to slip out as it massages other then that its awsomwe
customer_reviews.author: Austin M.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just take your time increasing the setting. Settings go from 1-5 and it starts at 1 once it begins. It will do its thing for 15 minutes. During the 15 minutes you can stop it instantly at anytime. You can also increase or decrease the setting instantly during the 15 minutes. Be warned... on the second day of owning, I ran it for two 15 minute sessions at setting 5. The massaging could be described as rough and slightly painful but felt good at the same time. This thing is strong! The next day my feet were bruised and it hurt to walk haha! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Massager
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for 5 years now and it has been a life saver at times... But with all good things, it's usefulness has come to an end. The massage nubs have broken thru the foot sock. Note: with continued use that caused calluses. All in all good product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Will

customer_reviews.title: Totally Unreliable Product
customer_reviews.text: It worked one day. While it did work, it was good. The product had a card inside to call their customer service before returning; unhelpful and rude. Too bad. If it were reliable I would have sung its praises; that's how well it worked, twice.
customer_reviews.author: JRyan

customer_reviews.title: Warning not returnable not even for a replacement!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and within the first week of training it and the first time I used it, it began to make a horrible grinding noise in the gears and the gears stop working during the course time it's grinding. I would accept Replacement but it doesn't appear to item is returnable or replacable. I will be contacting Amazon directly as this is not acceptable from a supplier on an item this expensive and within 7 days of receiving.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffaney Burke

customer_reviews.title: Heaven for your feet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as a gift after she tried my uComfy Foot Massager. She called the day she got it to let me know everyone fights over whose turn it is to use it. I must say, it's a heavenly experience. I have had mine for a few months now and use it daily. It's the bomb for Plantar Fasciitis. I guess the massage stretches out the tendons in your feet. All I know is, it is amazing. If you can't afford a fancy massage chair that does your feet too, get this.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: The best massager ever....but it stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this for me and it’s been my favorite thing to come home to after a long day of wearing heels at work. But after less than a year, it stopped working for no reason right in the middle of the massage. I checked the power cord, press the buttons, and nothing, it’s still not working. My 17yr old daughter spent her hard earned money on this useless massager. She wants her money back.
customer_reviews.author: Neems

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to operate and easy to move around the house
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to operate and easy to move around the house. I have neuropathy in my feet,I use it every night. Before using it my feet had bad circulation now I am improving.I wear heavy sock during treatment becaus my feet are tender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My family love getting foot massage, specially after a long working day.
customer_reviews.text: This foot massager is awesome! It has two settings P1 and P2. The first setting provides massage and pressure whereas the second just massage. The machine comes with a default 15 minutes massage with no options to increase the time, but i would not rate it down for this minor finding since it works great and I can re-run it as many times as i want. So far we have it for two days and works great. I am buying two more to give for x-mas
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this at first. But less then two months after owning it, it quit working. If I wiggle the cord it comes on, but then goes off in a few seconds. It is too late to return it. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Still using after many years ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a family go-to! Being on lock down, we have been doing a lot of "walking" and exercising as a family. Feet aches are rampant! This foot massager is golden and still works like a charm after all these years. We are loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Keeping But Not Recommending
customer_reviews.text: This product does make my feet feel better, but it wasn't worth the price. The heat function is hardly noticeable and I actually got a cramp in my foot the first time I used this because my foot was so cold. I have the vibration up as high as it goes and can only feel it if I really concentrate. It also had a really strong chemical smell to it the first 3-4 times I used it, and it was so bad the first time that it stunk up my whole house.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. WhiteTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good massage, not ok on the heat.
customer_reviews.text: Heat function is barely there at all, massage function is rather... sharp? Knobbly? I turn down the pressure. It does feel amazing afterwards but I really, really, really wanted heat and this just doesn't provide it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husbands for Christmas. He and my grandson love it!! Easy to use and gets the job done. My husband is on his feet a lot through the day and loves coming home, putting his feet in the massager to relax the muscles. He suffered a lot of cramping in his feet at night but now that doesn't seem to be a problem at all. Great product. I would highly recommend this foot massager.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Hunt

customer_reviews.title: This is not a foot massager
customer_reviews.text: ...it’s a toe massager. I’m under the impression that whoever designed this doesn’t have foot arches or heels, only toes. Perhaps it’s made by horses or centaurs. It does squeeze the bejeezus out of your toes, so if that’s what you’re into, you’ve come to the right place. If you walk in your while foot, however, keep walking..this isn’t for you.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Anjakos

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: I had this for about a month before it stopped working. Several calls to customer support resulted in wasted time. They had me fax over a copy of the invoice twice and still no response. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: patrick k comeaux jr

customer_reviews.title: first time he tried it out he did like eight cycles in a row
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend , I meant to just test it out and I ended up keeping it...first time he tried it out he did like eight cycles in a row, lol, he wouldn't get out of it. He bought one for himself immediately after... However he found one fifty bucks cheaper and I'm not sure what site that was on. Most likely amazon because that's all we use
customer_reviews.author: MichiganMamaMonika

customer_reviews.title: Not as good for larger feet
customer_reviews.text: This works as expected. I have size 11 feet and it does not massage my whole foot. My wife says it works great for her smaller feet.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Chojnacki

customer_reviews.title: It is AMAZING! I had him try it out and he ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend got this for me for Christmas. It is AMAZING! I had him try it out and he couldn't even get himself to leave it. (It has now become both of our gifts)
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Grimmett

customer_reviews.title: so I checked online for the best foot massage at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I believe it's been about four months since my purchase. I've had issues with my feet for awhile. Started playing more golf, walking rounds, but my wife refused to give me foot massages every day, so I checked online for the best foot massage at a reasonable price. This is what I came up with and have no regrets. I have two daughters as well as my wife that use it quite regularly. Don't think that with the first time use you should use pressure level 5, work your way up to a comfort level that feels right.
customer_reviews.author: JTD26

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this unit for my folks and I figured they would love it; unfortunately, this unit actually does hurt your feet if used often. The vibrating function on the box is non existent and the kneading balls sound like they are under a heavy load all the time. I'm only 170lbs with a size 9.5 foot (men's) and I can honestly say to search elsewhere. This unit only feels decent when using extremely thick socks and when you have your thighs in an uncomfortably straight and unnatural position (as if sitting at attention). Save your money and look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Eladio G.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and fresh out of the box it didn't work. I've reached out to try and exchange it but their "no returns" policy has me worried. There's no external damage at all, it wasn't as if it was dropped or broken in transit, it just doesn't work. I'll follow up if their Customer Service is at all helpful, so fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Can not use Heating and/or Kneading alone.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty awesome. I bought this hoping I could just turn on the heat or kneading alone, but i'm not able to do that. But this is still a fantastic product, but I would not recommend using it too often each day as many other people have said, can cause cramping. It's tempting to not use it though!
customer_reviews.author: Thefireball

customer_reviews.title: The think stopped working after just a few days of ...
customer_reviews.text: The think stopped working after just a few days of mild use. I suspect it's the power supply but right now I am out the $ I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foot blessing but broke :(
customer_reviews.text: There is no remote. The item is definitely worth buying. But, 1 year after using it (not often either) it doesn’t work. The pressure is inconsistent and it has a mind of its own! Super bummed because it helped immensely with my planter fasciitis
customer_reviews.author: Kelly VanPoppelen

customer_reviews.title: My husband has spider veins on his feet and ankles ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has spider veins on his feet and ankles. We think (totally subjective) that they are going away, at least they are less pronounced. Additionally using the unit is very relaxing. He uses it at least once a day as do I.
customer_reviews.author: juniee

customer_reviews.title: My wife was having such problems with her feet. ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife was having such problems with her feet. She works in health care and is on her feet for 8 hours at a time. This made a world of difference in her recovery after every shift.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: It was great until it stopped working (1-2 weeks in) even after following all the care instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this! The vibrations and heat are extremely soothing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! The vibrations and heat are extremely soothing! Me and my family use this about 5-6 times a day, and I've had it for a few months now, and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: John Henaen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I highly recommend. I have tried many home massage products and this one is worth every cent. There is one almost identical to this in Brookstone for 100$ more. You do not need to spend the extra 100$, I tried that one, and this product does the identical job!
customer_reviews.author: tally888

customer_reviews.title: Father's day gift that my husband fell in love with! My husband is a teacher and stands ...
customer_reviews.text: Father's day gift that my husband fell in love with! My husband is a teacher and stands most of the day. He raves about how great this feels after a long day or when he just wants to relax and watch the game.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Feels wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Feels great! Love the pressure on level 2, could only imagine how but more intense it gets.
customer_reviews.author: VonDIVA

customer_reviews.title: Fine and then it died.
customer_reviews.text: This lasted all of 2 months of occasional use. Pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Nope! Did not last first use!
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift. After first use it made a pop followed by a loud noise of plastic gears grinding... Returning today!
customer_reviews.author: Jim P

customer_reviews.title: Nice foot massager but doesn't really fit my size foot
customer_reviews.text: Nice foot massager but doesn't really fit my size foot. (13) The massager works well but does get rough and starts to hurt your feet after about five minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bodie

customer_reviews.title: Great message
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. All in the family seem to enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Tullier

customer_reviews.title: and while it certainly isn't as good as the "real deal"
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this foot massager daily since I purchased it, and while it certainly isn't as good as the "real deal", it does help ease the pain in my feet! I have only had it for a month, so we will see how it holds up over some time, but as of now I would recommend this as a good option for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John Mercer

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the options for adjucting the settings
customer_reviews.text: This is the most relaxing foot massage excluding a human that I've ever had. Definitely worth the price. I especially like the options for adjucting the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Tamah

customer_reviews.title: Didn't feel very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't feel very comfortable. I stopped using after two weeks Of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good, solid pressure on the bottom of your feet
customer_reviews.text: Lots of good, solid pressure on the bottom of your feet. Definitely not for larger feet though. Air pressure doesn't really work.
customer_reviews.author: M.P.H.

customer_reviews.title: My  feet feel great
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with a remote I use this regularly and recomend it to everyone I had time I would use it for hours every day
customer_reviews.author: Mad wagon lady

customer_reviews.title: this still works great! Nice massager
customer_reviews.text: After a few years, this still works great! Nice massager!
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality...did not last
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 4 months...started making a horrible sound. Very poor quality, really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BKS

customer_reviews.title: Broke after warranty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, who used it about a dozen times. Shortly after the warranty expired, so did the uComfy Foot Massager. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: James L Scott II

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the amt it costs . Wasn't relaxing and no heat really noticed
customer_reviews.author: joycelyn

customer_reviews.title: She didn't think she would like it at first
customer_reviews.text: Got it as gift for wife. She didn't think she would like it at first, but loves it. She's a nurse who is on her feet all day and it's really helped. I don't think she's used a setting over 2 - gives her feet a good massage. And the 15 min timer is useful - she already fell asleep once while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Steinheuser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works very well and I am very satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: No heat.
customer_reviews.text: The item does not have heat. And throws a spark every time I plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne Walker

customer_reviews.title: i only recommend you work up to setting number 5 lol its ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband he loves it and so do i .... i only recommend you work up to setting number 5 lol its a lil intense
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still working after daily use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife a years ago. She loves her daily foot massage. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: 89 year old mom uses this every day for her aches in her feet.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it 2x's so far (started on lowest setting) and love it! I'm pregnant so my feet are sore and the kneading action is great!!
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Most relaxing end of day
customer_reviews.text: So relaxing and makes your feet feel better. Takes using twice in a row to really feel the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Bartley

customer_reviews.title: If you have very high arches it may not reach all the way up there but I think it is great. Would love an on/off switch to power off ...
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my wife but I think I use it more than she does. If you have very high arches it may not reach all the way up there but I think it is great. Would love an on/off switch to power off without unplugging it.
customer_reviews.author: Jmburns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome, but not for people who can not take a little pain
customer_reviews.author: Brs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this foot massager for my husband as a Christmas present and he loves it. Feels great and easily adjusts to the pressure that is desired.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pressure stopped working after two weeks. Ucomfy wouldn't pay return shipping
customer_reviews.author: david f elliott

customer_reviews.title: works well, durable construction
customer_reviews.text: XMass present for the wife, she uses it daily and still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: N. GROVER

customer_reviews.title: Wake up your feet!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect on those days I hike up the canyon.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Parker Mills

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works good for average feet, size 12 a little cramped
customer_reviews.author: robert allen

customer_reviews.title: The massager was great but the unit broke on me and I have ...
customer_reviews.text: The massager was great but the unit broke on me and I have had to return to UComfy for replacement. The plug in socket that you plug into popped out and wires were torn thus no power. Very tedious and the socket was not firmly in place and easy to pop out and break when you pull the power cord out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I want to send it back but hubby does enjoy the massage
customer_reviews.text: It works, but the buttons haven't lit up for many days. I want to send it back but hubby does enjoy the massage. We cannot get heat or differ the pressures on the massages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only used this product a few times 6 or 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Only used this product a few times 6 or 7 times , I didn't expect it to stop working in a little over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just received It for Christmas and no power cord ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received It for Christmas and no power cord!!!! I hope it works being that the product was missing the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for foot massagers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for foot massagers. Wife has plantar fasciitis. This is the second one we ordered as it worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone in the family fights over it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, we love it. Amazing foot massage, the heat function works really good as well.
customer_reviews.author: dmark1867

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most impressive products that we have purchased in a long time. We use it every day!
customer_reviews.author: RONALD H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I keep it under my desk. It works as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not working at all. Called u comfy customer service ...
customer_reviews.text: Not working at all. Called u comfy customer service - not helpful at all. Asking me to call back Amazon about it.... Well I just want to ask maybe they could help figure out why it's not turning on before returning it... Defective product. I should have believe in what people say about u comfy having defective products and not working at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kyaw Than Aye

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! My only negative, I ordered in silver as a gift and was shipped red (it is a nice red) but still an error.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This really works great, brought 2 as gifts for my daughters, now getting one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: MColes

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. It is strong! I cant get to the top level myself :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's ok not a real fan but might work for some
customer_reviews.author: Steve Peter

customer_reviews.title: ... tennis and I can say that this is a great massager for your feet
customer_reviews.text: I play a lot of tennis and I can say that this is a great massager for your feet. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: unless you like the feel of plastic spikes
customer_reviews.text: Stay far away from this product, unless you like the feel of plastic spikes. I wanted to love this product but the plastic spikes just dig in and are very uncomfortable. I bought a product for half the price and works great. Instead they need to cover the plastic with rubber of some sort, stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Quade

customer_reviews.title: Great only if you want to have toe massager - Not a full foot massageer.
customer_reviews.text: My foot size is 9 and I'm medium built male. This massager works great only front half of the foot all around. On the heels I barely felt the massage action and NOTHING on the heals side. Even at the low settings the pressure on the toe is not comfortable. Returned to the marketplace seller but incurred $25 return shipping charge :( Didn't realize I need to pay for the return.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nathan

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! It is so relaxing after a hard days work. I would recommend this item to anyone that loves there feet massaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Money I Have Spent
customer_reviews.text: The best money I have spent in a long time. It gives a deep massage plus a pleasant heat that is comforting and not overpowering. It has a number of settings, but I haven't used more that the first one. My feet are women's 6.5 and my boyfriend's are size 9, and both of use it regularly. We keep it under a living room chair so we can use it right after work.
customer_reviews.author: kris10

customer_reviews.title: as good (or better) as the others that cost twice as ...
customer_reviews.text: Side by side, as good (or better) as the others that cost twice as much. The roller heat is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great and the air pressure is nice but it doesn't get your heels enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful machine which really makes your feet relax and not hurt. After 30 minutes in this machines with the "pressure" button and "heat" button on, my feet feel great! For the price, it is a great machine that does all it says it will do in the advertisement. I would recommend it to all who have their feet really hurt or ache at the end of the day. It really works!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Never got to really enjoy it because it stopped working
customer_reviews.author: RPG

customer_reviews.text: Love it It can be a lil rough,BUT omg hurts so good! Love this,gonna use it prolly every night Jus Sayn oK been using it..Yes love it.I fall asleep with a strange look on my face and the kids laugh.... Being honest be careful get used to this product,It can be rough. Seriously my feet feel awesome NOW! Its making some noise on start up will be updating

customer_reviews.title: great product i have recommened it to all my

customer_reviews.text: Just stopped working. Had less then a year. Worked well first 4to 5 months. Very disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice. Been using it each day and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice. Been using it each day and it feels great. Thought it would have other massage patterns to choose from but I can't figure out a way to change that.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Used this massager twice and the buttons no longer work ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this massager twice and the buttons no longer work to adjust intensity of massage. Have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Defective; didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Defective; didn't work after trying different outlets, etc. But putting my foot inside told me I would not want a working product anyway because the "massaging" nubs are hard! It would've hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sogoli

customer_reviews.title: Poor Initial Build Quality, but May be able to Redeem Itself
customer_reviews.text: So I received my foot messager yesterday and plugged it in, only to find out none of the controls worked and the machine was stuck in the on position. I was able to try it out, although unable to use any of the functions. It did feel good on the feet, so I have ordered another one and am sending the first one back. I will leave more detailed review then. Hopefully, the build quality will be better on the 2nd unit.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I normally hate these type of automatic messages; however this one is great. I originally bought this for my wife, but I also use it a lot. It will actually squeeze your feet so the rollers on bottom are pressed against the sole of your feet. There are 5 different intensity settings, and the lowest setting is pretty strong.
customer_reviews.author: Michael wales

customer_reviews.title: Amazing foot massage!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I bought this for my husband for Christmas and its a day later and we have already used it more than 3 times each. I did not find it painful at all though it is a deep penetrating message. If you have delicate feet then maybe it could be painful but I did not find it painful at all nor did my husband. Nice pressure and nice deep massage. I would recommend this for sure and may buy one for everyone in my family. I do not have a single complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Love Popcorn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it after being on my feet all day!! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: I love this massager
customer_reviews.text: I love this massager. It works wonderful and you can't beat the price. Every where I looked, this foot massager was always $100 more. This is a great deal!! It is so relaxing and my husband and I are always fighting about sharing it, so I might have to buy another one soon. The only negative thing is thing gets dirty and dusty quickly so its a little difficult to clean the inside,
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I was not impressed. It only does one thing ...
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed. It only does one thing and I did not find that thing relaxing nor did it even remotely sooth my sore feet. It is also not able to accommodate a size 12 as the massage balls completely miss the back area of my foot. I returned it after one try.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Brian

product_meta.title: uComfy Shiatsu Foot Massager 2.0, Red
product_meta.description: Style:Oval| Color:RedSit back and relax while your feet descend into heaven with this shiatsu foot massager from Ucomfy which features Five unique settings of massaging pleasure. Warm your tired feet with the heat setting turned on and let the machine knead and vibrate your pain away. For a different experience, leave the heat off and let air pressure comfort your skin. Keep this foot massager clean by simply wiping it with a damp cloth. Made from durable materials, including ABS plastic and nylon, the massager is sure to stand up to regular use, while the rubber stand keeps it in place while you relax.
feature_bullets: 5 LEVELS OF MASSAGE INTENSITY MODES: To increase versatility, the uComfy Shiatsu Oval Foot Massager has five different intensity settings, ensuring you get a comforting massage rather than a painful one. The graduated intensity settings also allow you to slowly increase the intensity of the massage during the course of the massage. You also have the ability to manipulate the controls located on the center console during your massage

2 MASSAGE STYLES: The uComfy Foot Massager has a 1) kneading shiatsu-style massage and 2) a vibration-style massage. The Massager comes with a heat option to help loosen your muscles and increase comfort you can use a single option or combine two or more settings, which increases versatility. The foot massager also has a Heating and air pressure setting for absolute control of your massage experience

USING THE PRINCIPLE OF FOOT REFLEXOLOGY: The uComfy Shiatsu Oval Foot Massager delivers an Acupressure massage surrounding your feet with heat and compression that is perfect for helping relax and soothe your tired, aching feet and relieve tightness, the acupressure massage uses manipulation of pressure points in your feet ,leaving you feeling relaxed and renewed

CAN BE USE REGULARLY YET STILL EASY TO MAINTAIN: For easy maintenance and improved hygiene, the Foot Covers are removable via zippers and are machine washable. You also can Keep the foot massager clean by simply wiping it with a damp cloth. The uComfy Shiatsu Oval Foot Massager is made from durable materials, including ABS plastic and nylon, the massager is sure to stand up to regular use, while the rubber stand keeps it in place while you relax

PRODUCT WEIGHT AND DIMENTIONS: The uComfy Shiatsu Foot Massager with Heat weighs 12 pounds and measures 17.7 x 15 x 18.1 inches, so it isn't a portable model, although it is small enough to stow in a large bag or a suitcase if necessary. You slip your feet inside the foot openings, so the device provides massaging action all around your feet, apart from the heels. The massager can be plugged into any regular outlet. Enjoy!
